summary: Sustainability focuses on principles and practices that support the long-term health of the planet and its inhabitants by integrating decentralized systems and regenerative design. It critiques traditional methods that often damage nature and society, instead advocating for resilient, interconnected ecosystems that foster renewal and resilience.
excerpt: Innovation should enhance the planet and society. Decentralized, regenerative design can solve global challenges, shifting from harmful practices to resilient, interconnected ecosystems.
